attributes.title: I can’t believe this.
attributes.review: My young daughter was on the app because her sugar daddy got it for her. She opened the app and saw an orange blob (she’s kinda blind). When she saw the orange figure she burst out into tears and started screaming. Blood ran from her ears and eyes. I was so scared I looked at the screen and passed out for a few minutes. I was pronounced dead on the scene until God told me there’s too many people that died from seeing this orange figure, in Heaven, and there was not enough room for me. Plus the apartments up there were too expensive. I woke up from me passing away, and was in shock for months. I’m just now able to talk about my experience. You all have to understand this is very hard for me, I even had to get my child a new sugar daddy. 🙄 Thank you for your time, I hate the app and that orange figure. Peace.

attributes.title: worst app.
attributes.review: this app is so useless i never want to get this app again please delete this app off of the app store it’s a waste of space it hurt me mentally . i felt so threatened by it , my dog is also so threatened by it .  I’ve never disliked an app this much ! then you can’t believe what was happening to my phone right after i downloaded it it started acting up and glitching just seconds before i downloaded this app and my whole house started shaking and things started to fall off tables,shelves, etc. And so i deleted it and my phone was absolutely traumatized, so i went and got it a therapist so it could help my phone and the therapist said it was because of this app i cannot believe this, i’m still so scared about what happened and i don’t think i could ever get over this thanks a lot . 🤬🤬

attributes.title: so disappointing
attributes.review: When I opened the app, my whole phone crashed from the utterly horrid pictures and information on the app (I’m having to write this from my smart microwave). I thought it was some sort of operational mistake so I tried opening the app again but then I saw this orange gremlin looking thing and I was so horrified, that sight will forever haunt my nightmares. I can still hear the trumpets at night sometimes, it was so scary I decided to take action so I went to the store for some garlic and fumigated my house with it, the problem of the trumpet’s voices seems to be solved. But every time the horrible sight of the gremlin pops up in my mind, I still get goosebumps and start throwing up uncontrollably, besides, I get an immense urge to scream “trump is a fascist, racist, rapist and child trafficker”. I know right? So weird...

attributes.title: orange man bad.
attributes.review: this app is disgusting. i saw a picture of trump getting a spray tan and he was ABSOLUTELY NAKED. this app is not meant for children. this is a PORNOGRAPHY app. do not get this app. Trump posts is tiny shrimp on here! absolutely gross! I get on and i see all these pictures of him. and i’m trying to get out and i click on a link. the link was a child trafficking link and i was absolutely terrified. then after that trump literally came to my house and tried to SELL ME. he grabbed and and threw me up against the house and literally ripped out each and everyone of my strands of hair after i said NO DONALD I DO NOT WANT TO GET TRAFFICKED. he didn’t care. he beat and abused me terribly. This app is BAD. it will give donald your location so he can some sell you away. i literally do not understand how you guys can sit here and let him traffic you !

attributes.title: My honest review 🧣
attributes.review: Worst app ever made!!👎it took 2 weeks to download, all my photos were deleted in order to make space for this bum app. All 1000 photos of my traps , pet roach and Michel b Jordan GONE. As  soon as I downloaded this app It made my phone glitch so bad  looking at it gave me sever pink eye 👁 and I had to go to the eye doctors👓 and my pink eye is still not better 😕my hospital bill was was racking up to 500k. as soon as I first open the app all a sudden millions of gigantic spiders  started coming from the walls chanting  “vote for 🍊” I was appalled by the slander, the profanity coming out of those spiders mouth. The spiders started coming close to me and that’s the  mommet I realized I had arachnophobia 🕷 with no hesitations I quickly 🤳🏾deleted the app and all the spiders disappeared  I will need so much therapeutic surgery after this 😿

When I downloaded this app it literally electrocuted me and I had to go to the E.R. Sadly I left my phone at my house with my pet hamster named ice cube who tried to swallow my phone because he saw Donald trump and thought he was an orange, which is his favorite food. He was also electrocuted and later died. I am outraged by this app and I don’t think anyone should download it, especially if you own a hamster or a bunny or any other small animal. I will never be able to see my hamster again and it’s all Donald trumps fault. My great grandmother bought me that hamster and it was my last memory of her. Worst of all, I am now bald because of the shock and I have to save up to buy a wig. In order to do that I have to stop buying food and start eating the leftover hamster food that my hamster ice cube never got to eat. DO NOT DOWNLOAD!!!!!

attributes.title: 👁👄👁 DISGUSTING
attributes.review: I hated this app soooooo much it was so bad. 🤬😡It took so long to install and it was asking for my location!! I sand that it was not allowed to use location so it started playing awful country music 🎼 then when I tried to close the app it glitched and froze my whole screen! I 🤬😡tried powering off my phone but then it turned the volume all the way up and my cat got super mad with the sounds that it started throwing up everywhere! 🤢🤮 Then the FBI agent watching my phone sent me a text and the text said : HAHA YOU STUPID FOOL!! And then the FBI agent had my phone shock me some how and I almost past out because it hurt so much! 😰I started crying because I was in so much shock! Then the screen unfroze so I tried to uninstall the game as soon as possible! That was the worst experience ever!!!!🤬😡 DO NOT INSTALL THIS APP!!!

attributes.title: Trump for Trash
attributes.review: When I first downloaded this app I thought it was going to be very cool, I thought I’d be able to meet all of those white supremasists and racists trump loves to meet but as soon as I started the download my power went out and the app refused to download. When my power went out it wasn’t good because that caused the millions of baby roaches I was incubating to swarm me and die on my toes!!! It was a very sad moment and I can only blame the Cheeto and his little snowflakes for these actions, the app never downloaded and I’m very hurt about this. Speaking more about my roaches that the Cheeto killed I’m very hurt because I was going to release them on people who believe in vaccinations and science because they deserve it and they are so silly!! I hope trumpy rumpy reads this and sees the damage he has caused me and my fellow roaches :(

attributes.title: PLS READ
attributes.review: i downloaded this app to educate myself on our president. right when i opened the app my whole phone turned orange! i ignored this and continued getting myself comfortable with the app. every time i click a button, the app would crash and shut off my phone. i took it to the store days after and found out this app had gave my phone a virus. i was shocked and deleted it immediately. i even had to buy a brand new phone! i needed some sort of educating on our president however and found out that our president is in fact, racist and homophobic. this can be learnt from a quick google search. now i am i democrat thanks to this app. remember guys it’s facts>feelings. so go educate yourself on trump and it doesn’t matter if your feelings get hurt. stop supporting this terrible orange president
